bun.description: Options specific to the Bun test runner

testFiles.description: Glob patterns for test files to run. Defaults to ['**/*.test.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}', '**/*.spec.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}']

timeout.description: Timeout per test in milliseconds. Defaults to 10000

bail.description: Stop running tests after the first failure. Defaults to false

nodeArgs.description: Additional arguments passed to the Bun process

env.description: Environment variables for the test run

command.description: Custom command to run instead of 'bun test'. Useful for custom test scripts

coverageAnalysis.description: Coverage analysis strategy. Must match the global coverageAnalysis setting

processPool.description: Enable process pooling for better performance. Defaults to true

maxWorkers.description: Maximum number of worker processes in the pool. Defaults to 4
